data.description: Resolve Brazilian city data for a given CEP
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
WWW::Correios::CEP relies on a webservice. Geo::CEP comes with a
    bundled database for faster (however, less detailed) data retrieval,
    so, it's interface is much more similar to Geo::PostalCode.
